name: skills-barchart
description: A horizontal bar chart for visualizing skills in different categories, where the x-axis is novice-proficient-advanced-expert. Good for interactive resumes!

scripts.build: tsc && node build.js && rm dist/index.js && mv dist/index.d.ts dist/skills-barchart.d.ts

author: Andy Perlitch (github.com/andyperlitch)
